name: Unified Taxi Trip Processor (Streaming Mode)
description: Processes real-time taxi trip data from Pub/Sub with sliding window analytics and loads into BigQuery Iceberg tables

parameters.name: mode
parameters.label: Processing Mode
parameters.helpText: Processing mode - must be 'streaming' for this template

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.label: GCP Project ID
parameters.helpText: Google Cloud Project ID where BigQuery dataset is located

parameters.name: dataset_id
parameters.label: BigQuery Dataset ID
parameters.helpText: BigQuery dataset ID containing the Iceberg tables

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.label: Target Table Name
parameters.helpText: Name of the target BigQuery table (default: taxi_trips)

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.label: Window Size (seconds)
parameters.helpText: Window size for streaming aggregations in seconds (default: 60)

parameters.name: sliding_window_size
parameters.label: Sliding Window Size (seconds)
parameters.helpText: Size of sliding windows for location analytics in seconds (default: 1800 = 30 minutes)

parameters.name: sliding_window_period
parameters.label: Sliding Window Period (seconds)
parameters.helpText: Period between sliding window calculations in seconds (default: 30 = 30 seconds)

parameters.name: enable_sliding_windows
parameters.label: Enable Sliding Windows
parameters.helpText: Enable sliding window analytics for location features (default: true)

parameters.name: data_source
parameters.label: Data Source Type
parameters.helpText: Type of data source (taxi, uber, lyft, etc.) for future extensibility
